Other apps either automatically save (which I would prefer in Evernote, and it does this for *new* notes), or ask if I want to save--not discard--the changes. Nope, in Evernote I have to reach up to the top left corner of the screen and tap the checkmark to save. Another annoyance is having to tap the edit button and then tap the text to edit a note. In other apps, simply tapping the text is sufficient to bring up the keyboard. A smaller issue is the left sidebar is essentially useless, since I can't actually navigate the notebook hierarchy from it--I have to choose "Notebooks" to get the same fullscreen list I get by just hitting the back button.
